properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 7:00PM EST until February 10 at 9:40AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...North Carolina...
Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and
Halifax Counties.
Dan River near Danville affecting Caswell...Rockingham...City of
Danville and Pittsylvania Counties.
Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County.
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County.

Moderate flooding continues along the Dan River from Danville
to South Boston. The Dan River has crested at Danville and is
beginning to crest at Paces.

Minor flooding continues at Randolph along the Roanoke
River. The river has crested here, and is now slowly
falling.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Dan River at Paces.
* until Monday morning.
* at 5PM Saturday the river level was 29.7 feet, and it appear
to be cresting.

* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* The river will begin falling overnight and continue to fall
to below flood stage late Sunday night.
* Impact...at 30.0 feet...Water begins to overtop the Highway 658
bridge across the Dan River.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 29.1
feet on Apr 26 2017.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.


The next scheduled statement will be issued by 5AM Sunday.
